entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix nullability warnings in projects targeting netstandard2.0 #47179
  • Allow rendering components to specific DOM node outside DOM hierarchy like React.createPortal #47178
  • Perf improvement: single_query #47177
  • QuickGrid has a race condition with disposal during init #47173
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow to use solution variables in .cshtml files #47172
  • In the core, why is there only ActionNameAttribute and no ControlNameAttribute #47171
  • UseRazorSourceGenerator breaks .NET Maui Blazor App projects #47169

Closed

  • DateTimeOffset modelbinding from form is always set to utc in net7 #45338
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #47170
  • Receiving r.arrayBuffer is not a function with InputFile component on iOS 12.5.6 #47116
  • [QuickGrid] Reevaluate the number of rows on the last page of a Virtualized QuickGrid #47139
  • [QuickGrid] Don't use scoped CSS for QuickGrid.razor #47140
  • [QuickGrid] Consider using reflection to avoid having to box every value (PropertyColumn Format). #47141
  • Refreshing a page (F5) Fails to load when using URL with Guid & double data type #47149
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #47154
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM breaks when using UsePathBase #46674
  • MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation not working after Publishing to Azure App Service (Linux) #46723
  • AppName.styles.css file has incorrect b- class identifiers #46940
  • IHttpContextAccessor, HttpContext and other related classes not working as expected. #47041
  • Can't serve valid blazor webassembly from Docker #47167

PullRequests

Created

  • Move SegmentWriteStream to shared resource #47180
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update service worker templates to prevent index.html being served when an offline resource is requested. #47168
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Include verb in gRPC JSON transcoding swagger path #47165
    area-grpc
  • Enable nullability in RDG and fix warnings #47144
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.5
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20 #47174
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/7.0] Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47162
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
